alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Nassau, north central Clay, central Duval, south central Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cisco Gardens, or 9 miles west of Jacksonville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Orange Park, Hilliard, Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Yulee, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Bellair-Meadowbrook Terrace and Bryceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Clay; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval
